ares-generate.description: Generate files for a webOS app or service

ares-inspect.description: Enable Web Inspector or Node's Inspector

ares-install.description: Install or Remove app from a device

ares-log.description: Show or save logs of webOS apps and services

ares-novacom.description: Command Line Tool to control target device

ares-package.description: Create a package containing a webOS app or service

ares-push.description: Push the file to target device

ares-server.description: Run a local web server based on path

ares-setup-device.description: Add or modify the information of the devices to use

ares-shell.description: Open a device terminal or run a command
